name: part_008
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2024】ｰ COLORFUL ｰ【3DLIVE】 [C-QdqYjdArM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Hakos Baelz perform 'Gurenge' by LiSA.
MC section where Tokoyami Towa and Hakos Baelz talk after their performance.

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った
subtitles.english: I found a reason to become stronger

subtitles.original: 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: Take me with you and move forward

subtitles.original:
紅蓮華
作詞：LiSA　作曲：草野華余子
subtitles.english:
Gurenge
Lyrics: LiSA  Composition: Kayoko Kusano

subtitles.original: 泥だらけの走馬灯に酔う
subtitles.english: Drunk on a revolving lantern caked in mud

subtitles.original: こわばる心 震える手は
subtitles.english: My stiffened heart and trembling hands

subtitles.original: 掴みたいものがある それだけさ
subtitles.english: Have something they want to grab onto, that's all

subtitles.original: 夜の匂いに空睨んでも
subtitles.english: Even if I glare at the sky through the night's scent

subtitles.original: 変わっていけるのは自分自身だけ それだけさ
subtitles.english: I'm the only one who can change myself, that's all

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った
subtitles.english: I found a reason to become stronger

subtitles.original: 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: Take me with you and move forward

subtitles.original: どうしたって 消せない夢も
subtitles.english: No matter what, even with dreams I can't erase

subtitles.original: 止まれない今も
subtitles.english: And the present I can't stop

subtitles.original: 誰かのために強くなれるなら
subtitles.english: If I can become stronger for someone's sake

subtitles.original: ありがとう 悲しみよ
subtitles.english: Then thank you, sadness

subtitles.original: 世界に打ちのめされて負ける意味を知った
subtitles.english: Battered by the world, I learned the meaning of defeat

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の華よ咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: O crimson lotus flower, bloom in full glory

subtitles.original: 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Lighting up my destiny

subtitles.original: イナビカリの雑音が耳を刺す 戸惑う心
subtitles.english: The noise of lightning pierces my ears, my heart is confused

subtitles.original: 優しいだけじゃ守れないものがある わかってるけど
subtitles.english: I know there are things I can't protect just by being kind

subtitles.original: 水面下で絡まる善悪
subtitles.english: Good and evil entangled beneath the surface

subtitles.original: 透けて見える偽善に天罰
subtitles.english: Divine punishment for the hypocrisy I see through

subtitles.original: Tell me why, tell me why, tell me why, tell me why, I don't need you!
subtitles.english: Tell me why, tell me why, tell me why, tell me why, I don't need you!

subtitles.original: 逸材に敷き詰められた 棘だらけの道も
subtitles.english: Even the thorn-filled path laid out for the talented

subtitles.original: 本気の僕だけに現れるから
subtitles.english: Will appear only because I'm serious

subtitles.original: 乗り越えてみせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can overcome it

subtitles.original: 簡単に片付けられた 守れなかった夢も
subtitles.english: Even the dreams I couldn't protect, cast aside so easily

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の心臓に根を囃し
subtitles.english: Let them take root in my crimson heart

subtitles.original: この地に宿って
subtitles.english: And dwell in this ground

subtitles.original: 人知れずはかない 散りゆく結末
subtitles.english: A transient end, scattering away unnoticed

subtitles.original: 無情に破れた 悲鳴の風吹く
subtitles.english: Heartlessly torn apart, a screaming wind blows

subtitles.original: 誰かの笑う影 誰かの泣き声
subtitles.english: The shadow of someone laughing, the sound of someone crying

subtitles.original: 誰もが幸せを願ってる
subtitles.english: Everyone is wishing for happiness

subtitles.original: どうしたって 消せない夢も
subtitles.english: No matter what, even with dreams I can't erase

subtitles.original: 止まれない今も
subtitles.english: And the present I can't stop

subtitles.original: 誰かのために強くなれるなら
subtitles.english: If I can become stronger for someone's sake

subtitles.original: ありがとう 悲しみよ
subtitles.english: Then thank you, sadness

subtitles.original: 世界に打ちのめされて負ける意味を知った
subtitles.english: Battered by the world, I learned the meaning of defeat

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の華よ咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: O crimson lotus flower, bloom in full glory

subtitles.original: 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Lighting up my destiny

subtitles.original: 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Lighting up my destiny

subtitles.original: Yeah! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Yeah!

subtitles.original: やったぜ！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！
subtitles.english: Yahoo!

subtitles.original: ということで、ENからべーが来てくれました！
subtitles.english: So, Bae from EN has joined us!

subtitles.original: 来ちゃいました！ハコス・ベールズです！
subtitles.english: I'm here! I'm Hakos Baelz!

subtitles.original: 先輩！お誕生日おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Senpai! Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: テンション高けぇ！
subtitles.english: So much energy!

subtitles.original: Happy, happy, まくる, happy birthday!
subtitles.english: Happy, happy, lots of, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: Oh my thank you very much!
subtitles.english: Oh my, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: いや本当に呼んでくれてありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Really, thank you so much for having me!

subtitles.original: いやありがとうね！あのめちゃめちゃ仲良いんだよね？
subtitles.english: No, thank you! We're actually really close friends, right?

subtitles.original: あの本当に仲良くて
subtitles.english: We're really close

subtitles.original: 実は本当に仲良くて
subtitles.english: We're actually really close

subtitles.original: 結構焼肉に行くうんですよね？
subtitles.english: We go out for yakiniku quite a bit, don't we?

subtitles.original: もうルーティンになってますね本当に
subtitles.english: It's really become a routine now

subtitles.original: そう焼肉行って 焼肉屋さんでお会計…
subtitles.english: Yeah, we go for yakiniku, and then at the yakiniku restaurant when we pay...
